availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

body.p: Born on February 25, 1834. Wash worked as a laborer in Anderson County in 1850. By 1860 he had become a school teacher in Anderson County. Died on May 19, 1881.

bibl.p: Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Anderson, p. 496; Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Anderson, p. 552; Find A Grave, "Ben F. Wash (February 25, 1834 - May 19, 1881)," Memorial #130194696, https://www.findagrave.com/cgi-bin/fg.cgi?page=gr&GRid=130194696&ref=acom (accessed June 22, 2017).
